quest.name: With Ale Due Respect
journal:
 Quest Sync
Riott seems eager to share the customs of Tomra.
objectives: Slay Scree gnomes and obtain gnome soulstones.
Deliver the gnome soulstones to Riott.
Use the bottles of Tomran stonebrew on Zigutt's statue.

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! Well, dent my helm with a knocker's arse! We've got ourselves a visitor─a strangerstrange dwarf from a strange land!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: If I'm to welcome you properly to Tomra, then I'd best be teachin' you our ways, eh? And that starts with payin' respects to Zigutt's statue!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: ...Ah, you wouldn't know your Riotts from your Ronitts, would you? The “Zigutt” I'm referrin' to is one of our ancestral chiefs─the mightiest warrior in Tholl history! You remember that name, lasslad.

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Now, first things first, we need to prepare the offering. That involves you bringin' me a couple of soulstones from them rock-headed gnomes out in Scree. Try not to get flattened, eh?

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: First off, we need two soulstones! You've got to take 'em from Scree gnomes, and let me tell you: they ain't goin' to cooperate!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Now, I'll just get my hammer out here and...<crunch>...ever so delicately...<crack>...grind these into powder!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: And there we have it! Some lovely bottles of stonebrew, seasoned with a sprinkling of gnomish soulstone!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: It's the soulstone what puts the “stone” in the brew. I mean, how else do you expect a statue to drink it!?

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Now for the ceremonial bit. You take these bottles, and empty 'em onto the four sides of Zigutt's statue over there. Every last drop, mind you!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: What are you waitin' for? Zigutt must be as parched as a squid in the desert after standin' in that square day after day!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As you pour the stonebrew onto the base of the statue, you almost believe you see a smile flickering across its impassive face...

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Aye, nicely done, lasslad, nicely done!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: You may have noticed, but we Tholls like a drink or two. And seein' the great Zigutt unable to hoist a tankard on account of him bein' a stone statue brings a tear to the eye. And so we honor his memory with the brew he loved best.

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: He was chief of the Tholl during the coming of the Flood─a true dwarf among dwarves! It was him what ousted that bastard Warrior of Light, and brought our people together in a time when division meant death!

dialogue.name: RIOTT
dialogue.text: Aye, we wouldn't be here now if it weren't for Zigutt. And I thank you for showin' him the proper respect!
